content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION   = 'https://sadevbrdatalakemalwee.dfs.core.windows.net/raw', 
	)
Go

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE RawDataOrderLogisticsVtex (
	[itemIndex1] bigint,
	[selectedSla1] varchar(8000),
	[lockTTL1] varchar(8000),
	[price1] varchar(8000),
	[listPrice1] varchar(8000),
	[sellingPrice1] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryWindow1] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryCompany1] varchar(8000),
	[shippingEstimate1] varchar(8000),
	[shippingEstimateDate1] varchar(8000),
	[idsla] varchar(8000),
	[namesla] varchar(8000),
	[shippingEstimate4] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryWindow2] varchar(8000),
	[price2] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryChannel] varchar(8000),
	[polygonName4] varchar(8000),
	[lockTTL2] varchar(8000),
	[pickupPointId1] varchar(8000),
	[transitTime1] varchar(8000),
	[deliveryChannel1] varchar(8000),
	[addressId2] varchar(8000),
	[polygonName1] varchar(8000),
	[pickupPointId] varchar(8000),
	[transitTime] varchar(8000),
	[idshipping] varchar(8000),
	[addressType1] varchar(8000),
	[receiverName1] varchar(8000),
	[addressId1] varchar(8000),
	[postalCode1] varchar(8000),
	[city1] varchar(8000),
	[state1] varchar(8000),
	[country1] varchar(8000),
	[street1] varchar(8000),
	[number1] varchar(8000),
	[neighborhood1] varchar(8000),
	[complement1] varchar(8000),
	[reference1] varchar(8000),
	[geocoordinates1] varchar(8000),
	[trackingHints] varchar(8000),
	[orderId] varchar(8000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'brazil/vtex/VtextOrderLogistics.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_sadevbrdatalakemalwee_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM RawDataOrderLogisticsVtex
GO
